re_convert_confirm_content: Are you sure you want to re-convert [Segment {index}]?
confirm_delete_content: Are you sure you want to delete this segment?
merge_next_content: Are you sure you want to merge this segment to the next segment? The original segment content will be deleted after merging
merge_prev_content: Are you sure you want to merge this segment to the previous segment? The original segment content will be deleted after merging
separate_content: Are you sure you want to separate this segment into a standalone segment? The original segment content will be deleted
delete_content_content: Are you sure you want to delete this segment content?
